name: Moviehouse Demo
description:
The full version of Moviehouse is coming soon to GOG.COM. You can wishlist here

Greed, for a lack of a better word, is good

-Positioning Statement here-

What is this? A studio for ants?

Experience the decades – start with a small film crew in the 80s, develop your
first short-film, and taste the sweet nectar of box office revenue. When your
enterprise expands, you’ll create better movies, hire a larger crew, and, of course,
need a bigger boat!

Drink their milkshake

Use your wits to outsmart the competition and leverage your intuition to spot the next hit-
genre at the box office. Win prizes at events, take the biggest slice of the pie, and
become the most successful studio Hollywood’s ever seen.

That’s a bingo

Make movies your way — pick from a dozen different genres and plot the perfect
storyline. Make a spy flick, a romantic comedy, a bloody slasher, or something
entirely different. It’s up to you to strike the perfect balance and make a true
blockbuster,becoming the godfather of cinema.

Cinderella story. Outta nowhere.

Assemble the dream team — hire directors and writers, nurturing their creative talent and skills to ensure optimal creative output. A good crew can bring viewers to seats, while the director charts the movie’s course. Make unknown actors famous overnight, or put them on the sideline if they don’t live up to the hype. After all, you’re the boss now!
